name: Ashik Rana
review: You don’t stop riding when you get old, you get old when you stop riding.

name: Omar Faruk
review: Life is not about waiting for the storms to pass: it’s about learning how to ride in the rain!

name: Bernard Hinault
review: I believe there are two periods in life, one for the bike, the other for becoming active on one’s work.

name: Vin Diesel
review: ₹It wasn’t until I went to college and I got my first motorcycle that I understood the thrill of speed.

name: Arafat Rhaman
review: Motorcycling is not, of itself, dangerous. It’s however, extremely unforgiving of inattention, ignorance, incompetence, or stupidity.

name: Delusha
price: You are on your own. You are not protected by two tons of steel, rubber, foam padding and safety glass.

name: Eric Bana
review: I look my best when I take my helmet off after a long motorcycle ride. I have a glow and a bit of helmet hair.

name: John Lasseter
review: I worry about kids today not having time to build a treehouse or ride a bike or go fishing. I worry that life is getting faster and faster.

name: Evel Knievel
review: The older I get, the faster I was. There are old bikers and there are bold bikers, but there are no old, bold bikers

name: Jacky Ickx
review: That is why, as soon as I felt a real attraction for my first passion which was the motorcycle, and in spite of the danger it could represent, they encouraged me.

name: Moznu shek
review: Faster, faster, faster, until the thrill of speed overcomes the fear of death.

name: Munna mikel
review: hin leather looks good in the bar, but it won’t save your butt from “road rash” if you go down.
